org.bytemechanics.cache.flashback.service

Interface CacheService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TTLCacheService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCacheServiceImpl

    public interface CacheService
    Cache Service adapter to manage and store caches In order to use this in Spring, please create your own implementation and annotate it or extend DefaultCacheServiceImpl
    Author:
    afarre
    See Also:
    DefaultCacheServiceImpl

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_CACHE_SIZE
      Default cache initial size
      static String EXPECTED_CACHE_SIZE_PROPERTY
      Default cache initial system property should be modified

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String expire(String _key)
      Expire cache invalidating its current value if any
      default <T> T from(String _key, Supplier<T> _supplier)
      Utility method to define register new cache if not exist, supply if not exist or expired and return a cached value
      default <T> T from(Supplier<T> _supplier, String... _keyParts)
      Utility method to define register new cache if not exist, supply if not exist or expired and return a cached value Example: _keyparts[]{mypart1,part2} will generate key mypart1.part2
      Object get(String _key)
      Recover the cached value or supply new value (put in cache and return it)
      default <T> T get(String _key, Class<T> _class)
      Recover the cached value or supply new value (put in cache and return it) casting to the given class.
      default Object refresh(String _key)
      Refresh the current cache value by calling expire() and getCacheValue() returning the new refreshed instance or null if the supplier return null
      default <T> T refresh(String _key, Class<T> _class)
      Refresh the current cache value by calling expire() and getCacheValue() returning the new refreshed instance or null if the supplier return null casting to the given class.
      String registerCache(CacheRegistryAdapter _cacheRegistry)
      Register new cache in the service store

    • Method Detail

      • registerCache

        String registerCache(CacheRegistryAdapter _cacheRegistry)
        Register new cache in the service store
        Parameters:
        _cacheRegistry - cache registry to register
        Returns:
        registered cache key

      • get

        Object get(String _key)
        Recover the cached value or supply new value (put in cache and return it)
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        Returns:
        Cache value as object
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - whenever key does has not been registered

      • get

        default <T> T get(String _key,
                  Class<T> _class)
        Recover the cached value or supply new value (put in cache and return it) casting to the given class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Cache value type
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        _class - cache object class
        Returns:
        Cache value casted as the given _class
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - whenever key does has not been registered

      • expire

        String expire(String _key)
        Expire cache invalidating its current value if any
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        Returns:
        cache key expired or null if not exist
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - whenever key does has not been registered

      • refresh

        default Object refresh(String _key)
        Refresh the current cache value by calling expire() and getCacheValue() returning the new refreshed instance or null if the supplier return null
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        Returns:
        the new fresh cache value or null if the supplier return null
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - whenever key does has not been registered

      • refresh

        default <T> T refresh(String _key,
                      Class<T> _class)
        Refresh the current cache value by calling expire() and getCacheValue() returning the new refreshed instance or null if the supplier return null casting to the given class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Cache value type
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        _class - cache object class
        Returns:
        Cthe new fresh cache value or null if the supplier return null cast to the given class
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - whenever key does has not been registered

      • from

        default <T> T from(String _key,
                   Supplier<T> _supplier)
        Utility method to define register new cache if not exist, supply if not exist or expired and return a cached value
        Type Parameters:
        T - cache value type
        Parameters:
        _key - cache key
        _supplier - cache supplier
        Returns:
        the cached value
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - key has not been provided or is empty

      • from

        default <T> T from(Supplier<T> _supplier,
                   String... _keyParts)
        Utility method to define register new cache if not exist, supply if not exist or expired and return a cached value Example: _keyparts[]{mypart1,part2} will generate key mypart1.part2
        Type Parameters:
        T - cache value type
        Parameters:
        _supplier - cache supplier
        _keyParts - cache key parts that will conform the key separated by dot
        Returns:
        the cached value
        Throws:
        CacheKeyUndefinedException - key has not been provided or is empty
